about.title: About Me
about.description: I've always had a deep fascination with technology. My journey began in childhood when I repaired my grandmother's phone and continued through my school years, fixing my own PC and helping friends with theirs for free. This early exposure to troubleshooting and repairing computers led me to start a small business, charging for my repair services, which further fueled my passion for systems and gaming. My interest in tech expanded when I began building gaming PCs for others, merging my love for gaming and hardware. This passion drove me to think bigger, focusing on scalable and high-availability systems and servers.

certifications.python: Python Course Certification: Mastering the Essentials

points: Architected and delivered scalable backend RESTful APIs using Node.js (Express) and Java (Spring Boot), applying microservices architecture, service-oriented design, and versioned API contracts.
Engineered asynchronous, event-driven pipelines using Apache Kafka and BullMQ, processing 100K+ messages per day and reducing peak CPU utilization by approximately 60%.
Implemented JWT-based authentication and role-based access control (RBAC) across 8+ microservices, securing access for over 1,000 active users.
Delivered real-time backend communication using Socket.IO, supporting 1,000+ concurrent connections with optimized WebSocket handling.
Designed and implemented NFC-based authentication APIs, enabling secure device-level access and seamless integration with React Native applications.
Optimized backend performance through debugging, root cause analysis, and system tuning, improving production stability and reliability.
Collaborated closely with UI/UX designers and clients to translate business requirements into scalable, high-quality, user-friendly solutions.
